name: helloworld
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.dev-browser: cordova prepare browser -- --livereload && cordova build browser -- --webpack.browser.config.js && cordova run browser -- --livereload --webpack.browser.config.js
scripts.dev: cordova prepare browser -- --livereload && cordova build browser -- --webpack.config webpack.config.js && cordova run browser -- --livereload --webpack.config webpack.config.js

author: Apache Cordova Team
